text: Aggie Maria Pati (born 19 November 2003) is an American Samoan women's footballer who plays as a defender for Black Roses. ==Career== Pati made her international debut for American Samoa on 30 August 2018, coming on as a substitute at half-time for Severina Mana'o in the 2018 OFC Women's Nations Cup qualification match against Fiji. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=3|American Samoa |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2018||1||0 |- !Total!!1!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Profile at oceaniafootball.com Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:American Samoan women's footballers Category:American Samoa women's international footballers Category:Women's association football defenders
title: Aggie Pati
